pkgmetadata.longdescription: ====================Python Mobile Detect====================.. image:: https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/trbs/pymobiledetect/status.png :alt: Build Status :target: https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/trbs/pymobiledetect/Detects mobile phones and tables from useragent string and http headers.Big thanks to Mobile-Detect from serbanghita.
